title: Add WhatsApp order notification button to checkout confirmation

requirements.text: Add a WhatsApp notification button to the OrderConfirmation component that opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message containing order details (customer name, address, phone number, product name, MRP, delivery charge) to phone number 9919031626

quotes: Jab bhi Koi bhi kuchh order Kare to message aa Jaye Disney order Kiya Hai name address number message a jaaye is number per 9919031626

acceptanceCriteria: Button appears on OrderConfirmation page after successful order placement
Button opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message to 9919031626
Message includes customer name, delivery address, phone number, product name, MRP, and delivery charge
Button uses WhatsApp green color scheme and WhatsApp icon
Works on both mobile and desktop devices

constraints: Must use WhatsApp web link format (wa.me) to ensure cross-platform compatibility
Do not modify backend order placement logic
Do not integrate with external SMS or email services
nonGoals: Automatic message sending without user action
Backend integration with WhatsApp Business API
